name: Unbroken - Mankind United
description:
Introduction

In Unbroken - Mankind United you play a spaceship pilot  of the Unbrokentaskforce, a global  defense operation established to fight off an alien invasion.

Gameplay

The game plays as a top-down 2D sidescroller. The player controls a spaceship using the arrow keys for movement and the space bar for weapon fire. During a mission, waves of alien ships are spawned. A wave is completed, as soon as all enemy ships are either destroyed (major score) or evaded (minor score).

Destroy all waves in order to succeed in your mission!

Dev Diary

For a detailed description each version, have a look at the corresponding entry in the dev diary.

Disclaimer

This is a very early prototype of the game. A short demo mission is already playable, demonstrating the core idea of the game. But most features are still waiting to be implemented.

Have fun and post your high scores!
